creator: openepub Co.
descriptionHtml:
Books have cheer up words .
Try read and cheer up!


free epubs are included as bundle ebooks.
Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Lewis Carroll),
Common Sense (Thomas Paine),
Pride and Prejudice (Jane Austen),
A Christmas Carol in Prose; Being a Ghost Story of Christmas (Charles Dickens),
Les Misérables (Victor Hugo),
The Adventures of Tom Sawyer (Mark Twain),
Adventures of Huckleberry Finn (Mark Twain),
The complete Sherlock Holmes Canon,
and so on and is adding free epub links to post on main view continuously

epub reader, epub viewer app to read epup file (.epub extention file format)

When I search the internet, I download epub e-book files at least once. Did you just download it and forget it?
Now open the epub file on the Android by "openepub" app and read it!


- free epub dowload site posted on main view.
- a few bundle epub files included.
- Table of contents(TOC) supported.
- The latest page is auto located when you open epub ebook to read again.
descriptionShort: free epubfile-Adventures of Tom Sawyer,Alice's Wonderland,Sherlock Holmes Canon

appDetails.developerAddress: Seoul the Republic of Korea(South Korea)

title: Openepub - epub ebook reader app

container.value: Seoul the Republic of Korea(South Korea)

creator: Openepub Productions
descriptionHtml:
* Openepub app has a function as epub reader epub viewer that allows you to easily read epub ebooks on mobile devices even if you do not have a dedicated epub reader epub viewer device.


* Main features of Openepub app

- 1. The table of Contents to navigate to key locations in the book.

- 2. A smart memory function that remembers the position of the page when the book is closed independently of the bookmark and finds the position of the last page read when the book is opened.

- 3. On the main view, the Openepub app service manager gratefully surfs the web and posts a free epub ebook site.

- 4. Audio playback, video full screen playback to enjoy various multimedia contents.

- 5. Double-tap the image to enlarge the image in a pop-up that allows you to see the image in more detail.

- 6. Tracking the path of moving and returning to hyperlink pages like Internet pages.

- 7. Swipe left or right or touch the left or right areas for easy page turn.

- 8. Select a larger text size to reduce eye strain.

- 9. Epub ebook attachments from the e-mail application are automatically copied to the Open epub app without a download procedure. It is excellent convenient functions that allows you to open and read epub ebooks right away.

- 10. Go to the previous page with the History of navigations or history buttons.

- 11. By using the history of bookmarks go again easily to the bookmarked location.
descriptionShort: Openepub app is epub reader epub viewer to read epub ebook on mobile devices.

creator: Openepub Productions
descriptionHtml:
* The Openepub is the EPUB reading system that reads EPUB ebooks downloaded from the internet.


* Main features of the Openepub

- 1. The table of Contents to navigate to key locations in the book.

- 2. A function that remembers the position of the page when the book is closed and moves to the position of the last page read when the book is opened again.

- 3. On the main view, the Openepub app posts EPUB ebooks sites.

- 4. Audio playback, video full screen playback to enjoy various multimedia contents.

- 5. Double-tap the image to enlarge the image in a pop-up that allows you to see the image in more detail.

- 6. Tracking the path of moving and returning to hyperlink pages like Internet pages.

- 7. Swipe left or right or touch the left or right areas for easy page turn.

- 8. Select a larger text size to reduce eye strain.

- 9. EPUB ebooks attachments from the e-mail application are automatically copied to the Open epub app without a download procedure. It is excellent convenient functions that allows you to open and read epub ebooks right away.

- 10. Go to the previous page with the History of navigations or history buttons.

- 11. By using the history of bookmarks go again easily to the bookmarked location.

- 12. Fixed layout: two page-plate, Media overlay, Zoom-out, Zoom-in, Sound track audio, Foot-note popup.
descriptionShort: EPUB reading system, EPUB reader, EPUB viewer

title: Openepub- EPUB  reading system

creator: Contents Color CO., LTD.
descriptionHtml:
The Openepub is an EPUB Reader app.

[ HELP GUIDE BEFORE USE ]
- 1. When you install the Openepub for the first time.
- 2. There is no EPUB e-book in the app as the initial default setting.
- 3. Read "Openepub Guide for Android users". And should download EPUB eBooks into the bookshelf.

[ MAIN FEATURES OF THE OPENEPUB ]
- 1. TOC
- 2. Remember the last location of reading pages
- 3. Posting website links of free EPUB eBooks.
- 4. Audio playback and video full screen
- 5. Double-tap the image to zoom-in the pop-up image
- 6. Track the path of moving pages
- 7. Swipe or touch to turn page
- 8. Select large text size
- 9. Direct copy EPUB eBooks from the email app's file attachments
- 10. Navigate reading pages
- 11. Add bookmarks of reading pages
- 12. Read Fixed-Layout EPUB eBooks
descriptionShort: Use this application to read the contents of the EPUB ebook file.

title: Openepub : EPUB Reader

container.value: Headquarters Address: 118ho, 3, Sinchon-ro 31an-gil, Seodaemun-gu, Seoul, 03774, Republic of Korea

creator: Contents Color CO., LTD.
descriptionHtml:
EPUB reading system app that uses EPUB eBooks downloaded from the internet.

[ *** HELP GUIDE BEFORE USE *** ]

- 1. When you install this Openepub Reader for the first time.

- 2. There are no pre-imported EPUB eBooks in bookshelf of Openepub Reader as the initial default setting.

- 3. Import EPUB eBooks into the bookshelf of Openepub Reader from the post of website links of "Download free EPUB eBooks" on the main view. It is helpful to refer to "Openepub Reader Guide for Android users" which is posted on the Openepub Reader's main view.

- 4. This Openepub doesn't work on some manufacturers' devices. Please provide feedback on your experience.


[ *** MAIN FEATURES *** ]

- 1. TOC

- 2. Reopen to the location of last reading page

- 3. Import free EPUB eBooks from the post of website links of "Download free EPUB eBooks" on the main view

- 4. Import EPUB eBooks by using "Open with" menu which appears at File Manager when tapping .epub file on file list

- 5. Import EPUB eBooks from the email app's file attachments

- 6. Audio playback and video full screen switch

- 7. Double-tap the image to zoom-in image on the popup

- 8. Track the path of moving pages

- 9. Swipe or touch to turn page

- 10. Select large text size

- 11. Jump to the reading pages by history buttons

- 12 Add notes, highlighters or bookmarks of reading pages

- 13. Read two main types of layouts in
Reflowable layout and Fixed layout of EPUB eBooks
descriptionShort: Read EPUB eBooks on your Android device.
